service.name: /psal424.ps
service.query:
SELECT ORG_CD AS CODE , ORG_NAME AS NAME , MAX(GUBUN_TOTAL) AS GUBUN_TOTAL , SUM(SALE_TOTAL)/1000 AS SALE_TOTAL , SUM(SALE9)/1000 AS SALE9 , SUM(SALE10)/1000 AS SALE10 , SUM(SALE11)/1000 AS SALE11 , SUM(SALE12)/1000 AS SALE12 , SUM(SALE13)/1000 AS SALE13 , SUM(SALE14)/1000 AS SALE14 , SUM(SALE15)/1000 AS SALE15 , SUM(SALE16)/1000 AS SALE16 , SUM(SALE17)/1000 AS SALE17 , SUM(SALE18)/1000 AS SALE18 , SUM(SALE19)/1000 AS SALE19 , SUM(SALE20)/1000 AS SALE20 , SUM(SALE21)/1000 AS SALE21 , SUM(SALE22)/1000 AS SALE22 , SUM(SALE23)/1000 AS SALE23
, MAX(GUBUN_CUST_CNT) AS GUBUN_CUST_CNT , SUM(CUST_CNT_TOTAL) AS CUST_CNT_TOTAL , SUM(CUSTCNT9) AS CUSTCNT9 , SUM(CUSTCNT10) AS CUSTCNT10 , SUM(CUSTCNT11) AS CUSTCNT11 , SUM(CUSTCNT12) AS CUSTCNT12 , SUM(CUSTCNT13) AS CUSTCNT13 , SUM(CUSTCNT14) AS CUSTCNT14 , SUM(CUSTCNT15) AS CUSTCNT15 , SUM(CUSTCNT16) AS CUSTCNT16 , SUM(CUSTCNT17) AS CUSTCNT17 , SUM(CUSTCNT18) AS CUSTCNT18 , SUM(CUSTCNT19) AS CUSTCNT19 , SUM(CUSTCNT20) AS CUSTCNT20 , SUM(CUSTCNT21) AS CUSTCNT21 , SUM(CUSTCNT22) AS CUSTCNT22 , SUM(CUSTCNT23) AS CUSTCNT23
, MAX(GUBUN_PROF) AS GUBUN_PROF , SUM(SALE_PROF_TOTAL)/1000 AS SALE_PROF_TOTAL , SUM(SALEPROF9)/1000 AS SALEPROF9 , SUM(SALEPROF10)/1000 AS SALEPROF10 , SUM(SALEPROF11)/1000 AS SALEPROF11 , SUM(SALEPROF12)/1000 AS SALEPROF12 , SUM(SALEPROF13)/1000 AS SALEPROF13 , SUM(SALEPROF14)/1000 AS SALEPROF14 , SUM(SALEPROF15)/1000 AS SALEPROF15 , SUM(SALEPROF16)/1000 AS SALEPROF16 , SUM(SALEPROF17)/1000 AS SALEPROF17 , SUM(SALEPROF18)/1000 AS SALEPROF18 , SUM(SALEPROF19)/1000 AS SALEPROF19 , SUM(SALEPROF20)/1000 AS SALEPROF20 , SUM(SALEPROF21)/1000 AS SALEPROF21 , SUM(SALEPROF22)/1000 AS SALEPROF22 , SUM(SALEPROF23)/1000 AS SALEPROF23
, '이익율' AS GUBUN_PROF_RATE , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALE_TOTAL_VAT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALE_PROF_TOTAL)/SUM(SALE_TOTAL_VAT)*100 END) AS SALE_PROF_RATE_TOTAL , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT9) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF9)/SUM(SALEVAT9) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE9 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT10) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF10)/SUM(SALEVAT10) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE10 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT11) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF11)/SUM(SALEVAT11) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE11 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT12) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF12)/SUM(SALEVAT12) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE12 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT13) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF13)/SUM(SALEVAT13) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE13 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT14) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF14)/SUM(SALEVAT14) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE14 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT15) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF15)/SUM(SALEVAT15) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE15 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT16) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF16)/SUM(SALEVAT16) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE16 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT17) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF17)/SUM(SALEVAT17) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE17 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT18) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF18)/SUM(SALEVAT18) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE18 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT19) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF19)/SUM(SALEVAT19) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE19 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT20) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF20)/SUM(SALEVAT20) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE20 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT21) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF21)/SUM(SALEVAT21) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE21 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT22) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF22)/SUM(SALEVAT22) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE22 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT23) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF23)/SUM(SALEVAT23) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE23 FROM ( SELECT A.PUMBUN_CD AS ORG_CD , C.PUMBUN_NAME AS ORG_NAME , '총매출' AS GUBUN_TOTAL , SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) AS SALE_TOTAL , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '0900' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1000' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE9 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1000' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1100' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE10 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1100' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1200' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE11 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1200' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1300' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE12 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1300' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1400' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE13 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1400' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1500' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE14 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1500' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1600' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE15 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1600' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1700' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE16 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1700' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1800' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE17 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1800' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1900' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE18 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1900' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2000' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE19 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2000' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2100' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE20 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2100' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2200' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE21 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2200' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2300' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE22 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2300' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2400' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE23
, '구매객수' AS GUBUN_CUST_CNT , SUM(A.CUST_CNT) AS CUST_CNT_TOTAL , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '0900' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1000' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT9 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1000' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1100' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT10 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1100' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1200' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT11 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1200' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1300' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT12 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1300' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1400' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT13 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1400' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1500' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT14 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1500' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1600' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT15 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1600' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1700' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT16 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1700' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1800' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT17 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1800' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1900' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT18 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1900' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2000' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT19 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2000' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2100' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT20 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2100' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2200' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT21 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2200' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2300' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT22 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2300' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2400' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT23
, '이익액' AS GUBUN_PROF , SUM(A.SALE_PROF_AMT) AS SALE_PROF_TOTAL , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '0900' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1000' THEN SUM(A.SALE_PROF_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEPROF9 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1000' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1100' THEN SUM(A.SALE_PROF_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEPROF10 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1100' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1200' THEN SUM(A.SALE_PROF_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEPROF11 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1200' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1300' THEN SUM(A.SALE_PROF_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEPROF12 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1300' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1400' THEN SUM(A.SALE_PROF_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEPROF13 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1400' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1500' THEN SUM(A.SALE_PROF_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEPROF14 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1500' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1600' THEN SUM(A.SALE_PROF_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEPROF15 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1600' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1700' THEN SUM(A.SALE_PROF_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEPROF16 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1700' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1800' THEN SUM(A.SALE_PROF_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEPROF17 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1800' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1900' THEN SUM(A.SALE_PROF_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEPROF18 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1900' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2000' THEN SUM(A.SALE_PROF_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEPROF19 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2000' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2100' THEN SUM(A.SALE_PROF_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEPROF20 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2100' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2200' THEN SUM(A.SALE_PROF_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEPROF21 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2200' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2300' THEN SUM(A.SALE_PROF_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEPROF22 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2300' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2400' THEN SUM(A.SALE_PROF_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEPROF23
, '부가세' AS GUBUN_VAT , SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT) AS SALE_TOTAL_VAT , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '0900' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1000' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEVAT9 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1000' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1100' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEVAT10 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1100' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1200' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEVAT11 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1200' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1300' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEVAT12 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1300' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1400' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEVAT13 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1400' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1500' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEVAT14 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1500' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1600' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEVAT15 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1600' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1700' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEVAT16 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1700' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1800' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEVAT17 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1800' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1900' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEVAT18 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1900' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2000' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEVAT19 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2000' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2100' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEVAT20 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2100' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2200' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEVAT21 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2200' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2300' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEVAT22 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2300' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2400' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALEVAT23 FROM ( SELECT LPAD(D.SALE_ORG_CD,8) || '00' AS ORG_CD , A.PUMBUN_CD , A.SALE_TIME , NVL(A.NORM_SALE_AMT,0) AS NORM_SALE_AMT , (CASE WHEN C.TAX_FLAG = '1' THEN NVL(A.NORM_SALE_AMT,0)/1.1 ELSE NVL(A.NORM_SALE_AMT,0) END) AS NORM_SALE_AMT_VAT , NVL(A.SALE_PROF_AMT,0) AS SALE_PROF_AMT , A.CUST_CNT FROM DPS.PS_TIMEEVENT A , DPS.PC_ORGMST B , DPS.PC_PBNMST C , DPS.PC_STRPBN D WHERE B.ORG_CD = D.SALE_ORG_CD AND A.STR_CD = D.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD = D.PUMBUN_CD AND B.STR_CD = ? AND B.DEPT_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND B.TEAM_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND B.PC_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND A.EVENT_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND A.SALE_DT >= ? AND A.SALE_DT <= ?
) A , DPS.PC_ORGMST B , DPS.PC_STRPBN C WHERE A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD AND B.STR_CD = C.STR_CD AND A.PUMBUN_CD = C.PUMBUN_CD AND EXISTS ( SELECT MYORG.USER_ID FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND MYORG.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND MYORG.TEAM_CD = B.TEAM_CD AND MYORG.PC_CD = B.PC_CD AND MYORG.PUMBUN_CD = A.PUMBUN_CD AND MYORG.USER_ID = ? )
GROUP BY A.PUMBUN_CD , C.PUMBUN_NAME , A.SALE_TIME ) A GROUP BY A.ORG_CD , A.ORG_NAME
UNION ALL
SELECT '' AS CODE , '합계' AS NAME , '총매출' AS GUBUN_TOTAL , SUM(SALE_TOTAL)/1000 AS SALE_TOTAL , SUM(SALE9)/1000 AS SALE9 , SUM(SALE10)/1000 AS SALE10 , SUM(SALE11)/1000 AS SALE11 , SUM(SALE12)/1000 AS SALE12 , SUM(SALE13)/1000 AS SALE13 , SUM(SALE14)/1000 AS SALE14 , SUM(SALE15)/1000 AS SALE15 , SUM(SALE16)/1000 AS SALE16 , SUM(SALE17)/1000 AS SALE17 , SUM(SALE18)/1000 AS SALE18 , SUM(SALE19)/1000 AS SALE19 , SUM(SALE20)/1000 AS SALE20 , SUM(SALE21)/1000 AS SALE21 , SUM(SALE22)/1000 AS SALE22 , SUM(SALE23)/1000 AS SALE23
, '구매객수' AS GUBUN_CUST_CNT , SUM(CUST_CNT_TOTAL) AS CUST_CNT_TOTAL , SUM(CUSTCNT9) AS CUSTCNT9 , SUM(CUSTCNT10) AS CUSTCNT10 , SUM(CUSTCNT11) AS CUSTCNT11 , SUM(CUSTCNT12) AS CUSTCNT12 , SUM(CUSTCNT13) AS CUSTCNT13 , SUM(CUSTCNT14) AS CUSTCNT14 , SUM(CUSTCNT15) AS CUSTCNT15 , SUM(CUSTCNT16) AS CUSTCNT16 , SUM(CUSTCNT17) AS CUSTCNT17 , SUM(CUSTCNT18) AS CUSTCNT18 , SUM(CUSTCNT19) AS CUSTCNT19 , SUM(CUSTCNT20) AS CUSTCNT20 , SUM(CUSTCNT21) AS CUSTCNT21 , SUM(CUSTCNT22) AS CUSTCNT22 , SUM(CUSTCNT23) AS CUSTCNT23
, '이익액' AS GUBUN_PROF , SUM(SALE_PROF_TOTAL)/1000 AS SALE_PROF_TOTAL , SUM(SALEPROF9)/1000 AS SALEPROF9 , SUM(SALEPROF10)/1000 AS SALEPROF10 , SUM(SALEPROF11)/1000 AS SALEPROF11 , SUM(SALEPROF12)/1000 AS SALEPROF12 , SUM(SALEPROF13)/1000 AS SALEPROF13 , SUM(SALEPROF14)/1000 AS SALEPROF14 , SUM(SALEPROF15)/1000 AS SALEPROF15 , SUM(SALEPROF16)/1000 AS SALEPROF16 , SUM(SALEPROF17)/1000 AS SALEPROF17 , SUM(SALEPROF18)/1000 AS SALEPROF18 , SUM(SALEPROF19)/1000 AS SALEPROF19 , SUM(SALEPROF20)/1000 AS SALEPROF20 , SUM(SALEPROF21)/1000 AS SALEPROF21 , SUM(SALEPROF22)/1000 AS SALEPROF22 , SUM(SALEPROF23)/1000 AS SALEPROF23
, '이익율' AS GUBUN_PROF_RATE , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALE_TOTAL_VAT) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALE_PROF_TOTAL)/SUM(SALE_TOTAL_VAT)*100 END) AS SALE_PROF_RATE_TOTAL , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT9) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF9)/SUM(SALEVAT9) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE9 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT10) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF10)/SUM(SALEVAT10) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE10 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT11) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF11)/SUM(SALEVAT11) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE11 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT12) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF12)/SUM(SALEVAT12) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE12 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT13) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF13)/SUM(SALEVAT13) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE13 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT14) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF14)/SUM(SALEVAT14) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE14 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT15) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF15)/SUM(SALEVAT15) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE15 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT16) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF16)/SUM(SALEVAT16) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE16 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT17) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF17)/SUM(SALEVAT17) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE17 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT18) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF18)/SUM(SALEVAT18) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE18 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT19) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF19)/SUM(SALEVAT19) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE19 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT20) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF20)/SUM(SALEVAT20) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE20 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT21) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF21)/SUM(SALEVAT21) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE21 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT22) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF22)/SUM(SALEVAT22) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE22 , ( CASE WHEN SUM(SALEVAT23) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE SUM(SALEPROF23)/SUM(SALEVAT23) END)*100 AS SALEPROFRATE23 FROM ( SELECT A.PUMBUN_CD AS ORG_CD , C.PUMBUN_NAME AS ORG_NAME , '총매출' AS GUBUN_TOTAL , SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) AS SALE_TOTAL , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '0900' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1000' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE9 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1000' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1100' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE10 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1100' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1200' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE11 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1200' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1300' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE12 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1300' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1400' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE13 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1400' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1500' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE14 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1500' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1600' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE15 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1600' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1700' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE16 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1700' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1800' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE17 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1800' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1900' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE18 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1900' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2000' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE19 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2000' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2100' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE20 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2100' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2200' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE21 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2200' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2300' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE22 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2300' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2400' THEN SUM(A.NORM_SALE_AMT) ELSE 0 END ) AS SALE23
, '구매객수' AS GUBUN_CUST_CNT , SUM(A.CUST_CNT) AS CUST_CNT_TOTAL , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '0900' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1000' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT9 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1000' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1100' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT10 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1100' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1200' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT11 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1200' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1300' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT12 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1300' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1400' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT13 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1400' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1500' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT14 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1500' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1600' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT15 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1600' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1700' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT16 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1700' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1800' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT17 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1800' AND A.SALE_TIME < '1900' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT18 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '1900' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2000' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT19 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2000' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2100' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT20 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2100' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2200' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT21 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2200' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2300' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT22 , ( CASE WHEN A.SALE_TIME >= '2300' AND A.SALE_TIME < '2400' THEN SUM(A.CUST_CNT) ELSE 0 END ) AS CUSTCNT23

AND B.DEPT_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND B.TEAM_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND B.PC_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND A.EVENT_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND A.SALE_DT >= ? AND A.SALE_DT <= ? AND EXISTS ( SELECT MYORG.USER_ID FROM COM.V_MYORG MYORG WHERE MYORG.STR_CD = B.STR_CD AND MYORG.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD AND MYORG.TEAM_CD = B.TEAM_CD AND MYORG.PC_CD = B.PC_CD AND MYORG.USER_ID = ? ) ) A , DPS.PC_ORGMST B WHERE A.ORG_CD = B.ORG_CD GROUP BY A.ORG_CD , B.ORG_SHORT_NAME , A.SALE_TIME ) A
